import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' // import MRouter from './../router/index' import { useLocation, useNavigate, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from './Default.module.scss' import LogoImg from './../../assets/pcImg/logo.png' import CustomImg from './../../assets/pcImg/customer.png' export default function DefaultLayout() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { pathname } = useLocation() console.log(pathname) const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0); const changeLinkTab = (num: number, url: string) => { setActiveTab(num); navigate(url, { replace: true }) } useEffect(() => { },[]) return (
changeLinkTab(0, '/home') }>首页
changeLinkTab(1, '/zanzu')}>赞助
changeLinkTab(2,'/huodong')}>活动
changeLinkTab(3,'/show')}>展示平台
changeLinkTab(4,'/about')}>关于我们
联系客服
联系客服
) }
